question: Question: Peroxyacetyl nitrates can be found in this environmental phenomenon. For 10 points each: [10] Name type of weather typified by high ozone levels and the sunlight catalyzed reaction of nitrogen oxides and hydrocarbons. It is a problem in many big cities.
